MS MCQs

    Classify images with the Microsoft Custom Vision Service - Summary and knowledge check

    »

    1. When creating a new Custom Vision Service project, what is a domain used for?

      Helps you decide what to name your project.

      Helps you decide how to structure your project.

      Optimizes the classifier for a specific image type.


    2. Why should you add a tag after uploading images?

      To help you organize your images in the project for later use

      To put the images in a category for training

      To generate a word cloud after training


    3. What two values do you need to know in order to make a call to the Prediction API from client code?

      Prediction URL and Prediction Key

      Service name and authentication token

      Client secret and redirect URI
